mapper.select: select c.id, c.fullname,c.appellation,c.owner, c.company, c.job, c.email, c.phone, c.website, c.mphone,c.state, c.source,u2.name as create_by, c.create_time,u3.name as edit_by, c.edit_time, c.description, c.contact_summary, c.next_contact_time,c.address from tbl_clue c /*join tbl_dic_value dv1 on c.appellation=dv1.id join tbl_dic_value dv2 on c.state=dv2.id join tbl_dic_value dv3 on c.source=dv3.id join tbl_user u1 on c.owner=u1.id*/ join tbl_user u2 on c.create_by=u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on c.edit_by=u3.id where c.id = #{id}
mapper.delete:
delete from tbl_clue where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select c.id, c.fullname,dv1.value as appellation,u1.name as owner, c.company, c.job, c.email, c.phone, c.website, c.mphone,dv2.value as state, dv3.value as source,u2.name as create_by, c.create_time,u3.name as edit_by, c.edit_time, c.description, c.contact_summary, c.next_contact_time,c.address from tbl_clue c left join tbl_dic_value dv1 on c.appellation=dv1.id left join tbl_dic_value dv2 on c.state=dv2.id left join tbl_dic_value dv3 on c.source=dv3.id join tbl_user u1 on c.owner=u1.id join tbl_user u2 on c.create_by=u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on c.edit_by=u3.id where c.id = #{id}
